alert.note: Alert for Naguabo (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued April 23 at 6:13PM ADT until April 23 at 7:15PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM AST THIS EVENING FOR NAGUABO COUNTY... At 513 PM AST, USGS river sensors still showing the Rio Blanco in Naguabo out of its bank. It is producing flooding along Road PR-31/191. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by surges of water. SOURCE...Gauges reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. FLASH FLOOD...GAUGE INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
